name: Aether Tide
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard X creature cards.
Return X target creatures to their owners' hands.
flavor_text: The tide of magic brought them here. Now it would take them home.

name: Allay
oracle_text:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Destroy target enchantment.

name: Anarchist
oracle_text: When Anarchist enters the battlefield, you may return target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: "I'll take that. You won't need it when the revolution comes."

name: Angelic Blessing
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: Only the warrior who can admit mortal weakness will be bolstered by immortal strength.

name: Avenging Druid
oracle_text: Whenever Avenging Druid deals damage to an opponent, you may reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a land card. If you do, put that card onto the battlefield and put all other cards revealed this way into your graveyard.

name: Bequeathal
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When enchanted creature dies, you draw two cards.
flavor_text:
"On my death, I give you this treasure: the knowledge that life is hard, yet too soon past."
—Dal funeral rite

name: Carnophage
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, tap Carnophage unless you pay 1 life.
flavor_text: Eating is all it knows.

name: Cat Burglar
oracle_text: {2}{B}, {T}: Target player discards a card. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor_text: The *il*-Kor no longer roam the open plains, but they are still hunters.

name: Charging Paladin
oracle_text: Whenever Charging Paladin attacks, it gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Hope shall be the blade that severs our bonds."

name: Cinder Crawler
oracle_text: {R}: Cinder Crawler gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate only if Cinder Crawler is blocked.
flavor_text: The crawler doesn't care what gets in its way. It pushes everything into the boiling muck and waits for the meal to cook.

name: Culling the Weak
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Add {B}{B}{B}{B}.
flavor_text:
"The blood of the weak shall be the ink with which we scribe great Yawgmoth's glorious name."
—Stronghold architect, journal

name: Cunning
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.
When enchanted creature attacks or blocks, sacrifice Cunning at the beginning of the next cleanup step.
flavor_text:
". . . Dry-walkers die
We feed on sweet flesh . . . ."
—*Rootwater Saga*

name: Cursed Flesh
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 and has fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
flavor_text: A farewell to arms . . . and feet . . . and legs . . . .

name: Dauthi Jackal
oracle_text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
{B}{B}, Sacrifice Dauthi Jackal: Destroy target blocking creature.
flavor_text:
"All Dauthi are jackals, regardless of breed."
—Lyna, Soltari emissary

name: Death's Duet
oracle_text: Return two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Life has always been a dance. It is only fitting that death sing the tune.

name: Dizzying Gaze
oracle_text:
Enchant creature you control
{R}: Enchanted creature deals 1 damage to target creature with flying.
flavor_text:
"When I cut down my angel I only started my fall."
—Crovax

name: Elvish Berserker
oracle_text: Whenever Elvish Berserker becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.
flavor_text: Their fury scatters enemies like a pile of dry leaves.

name: Fade Away
oracle_text: For each creature, its controller sacrifices a permanent unless they pay {1}.
flavor_text:
"Consider the fable of the greedy herder. As her flock grew, so did her weariness; she slept, and the sheep wandered off."
—Karn, silver golem

name: Furnace Brood
oracle_text: {R}: Target creature can't be regenerated this turn.
flavor_text: Furnace air crackles with magmatic cackles.

name: Grollub
oracle_text: Whenever Grollub is dealt damage, each opponent gains that much life.
flavor_text: Mogglings caught in a misdeed often blame the grollub. Even though the creature is usually innocent, no taskmaster can resist an excuse to beat it.

name: Jackalope Herd
oracle_text: When you cast a spell, return Jackalope Herd to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: There's little more demeaning than getting your butt kicked by a bunch of bunnies.

name: Kor Chant
oracle_text: All damage that would be dealt this turn to target creature you control by a source of your choice is dealt to another target creature instead.
flavor_text: The true treasure no thief can touch.

name: Mage il-Vec
oracle_text: {T}, Discard a card at random: Mage il-Vec deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Living below a flowstone foundry produces a disproportionate number of fire mages among the *il*.

name: Maniacal Rage
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't block.
flavor_text: Only by sacrificing any semblance of defense could Gerrard best Greven.

name: Merfolk Looter
oracle_text: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
flavor_text: In the depths of Rootwater, salvage and sewage differ only in texture.

name: Nausea
oracle_text: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Any mogg will tell you there's nothing more nauseating than the smell of cute.

name: Onslaught
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, tap target creature.
flavor_text: The last thing to go through the mogg's mind was its teeth.

name: Plated Rootwalla
oracle_text: {2}{G}: Plated Rootwalla gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
flavor_text:
" . . . And the third little boar built his house out of rootwalla plates . . . ."
—Skyshroud children's story

name: Predatory Hunger
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Whenever an opponent casts a creature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature.
flavor_text: Hunger growls, never purrs.

name: Pygmy Troll
oracle_text:
Whenever Pygmy Troll becomes blocked by a creature, Pygmy Troll gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
{G}: Regenerate Pygmy Troll.
flavor_text: "Who you callin' 'shorty'?"

name: Rabid Wolverines
oracle_text: Whenever Rabid Wolverines becomes blocked by a creature, Rabid Wolverines gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Is there any other kind?

name: Raging Goblin
oracle_text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavor_text: Volrath has bred them to fear only him. Are they charging into battle, or merely fleeing his wrath?

name: Reaping the Rewards
oracle_text:
Buyback—Sacrifice a land. (You may sacrifice a land in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
You gain 2 life.

name: Reckless Ogre
oracle_text: Whenever Reckless Ogre attacks alone, it gets +3/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: There is no such thing as a regiment of ogres.

name: Reclaim
oracle_text: Put target card from your graveyard on top of your library.
flavor_text: The wise pay as much attention to what they throw away as to what they keep.

name: Robe of Mirrors
oracle_text:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
flavor_text: "Does this make me look fat?"

name: Rootwater Alligator
oracle_text: Sacrifice a Forest: Regenerate Rootwater Alligator.
flavor_text: Subduing and skinning an alligator is the first rite of maturity adolescent merfolk must pass.

name: Rootwater Mystic
oracle_text: {1}{U}: Look at the top card of target player's library.
flavor_text:
"Read the roots tell the tale
Future forms in waving weeds
Higher than truth is hope."
—*Rootwater Saga*

name: Scare Tactics
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Fear rules those weak enough to accept it."
—Greven *il*-Vec

name: School of Piranha
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice School of Piranha unless you pay {1}{U}.
flavor_text: Some schools aren't worth getting into.

name: Shackles
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
{W}: Return Shackles to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Shackles of gold are still shackles.

name: Shattering Pulse
oracle_text:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Destroy target artifact.

name: Shield Mate
oracle_text: Sacrifice Shield Mate: Target creature gets +0/+4 until end of turn.
flavor_text: They bear weightier burdens than the shields they carry.

name: Soltari Visionary
oracle_text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Whenever Soltari Visionary deals damage to a player, destroy target enchantment that player controls.

name: Sonic Burst
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card at random.
Sonic Burst deals 4 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Music scythes the savage beast.

name: Soul Warden
oracle_text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
flavor_text:
Count carefully the souls and see that none are lost.
—Vec teaching

name: Standing Troops
oracle_text: Vigilance
flavor_text: The less you have, the harder you fight for it.

name: Thalakos Scout
oracle_text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Discard a card: Return Thalakos Scout to its owner's hand.

name: Theft of Dreams
oracle_text: Draw a card for each tapped creature target opponent controls.
flavor_text:
"Volrath stole everything there was of me."
—Takara

name: Thrull Surgeon
oracle_text: {1}{B}, Sacrifice Thrull Surgeon: Look at target player's hand and choose a card from it. That player discards that card. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor_text: "Just take a little off the top."

name: Vampire Hounds
oracle_text: Discard a creature card: Vampire Hounds gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The hounds' barks are a horrifying chorus of screams, moans, and whispers.

name: Wayward Soul
oracle_text:
Flying
{U}: Put Wayward Soul on top of its owner's library.
flavor_text:
"no home no heart no hope"
—Stronghold graffito

name: Welkin Hawk
oracle_text:
Flying
When Welkin Hawk dies, you may search your library for a card named Welkin Hawk, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

name: Whiptongue Frog
oracle_text: {U}: Whiptongue Frog gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: Their favorite food? Wind dancers.

name: Wood Elves
oracle_text: When Wood Elves enters the battlefield, search your library for a Forest card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Secure in the embrace of wood, they want no part of Eladamri's war.
